name: Pew Pew (TechWhizGames)
description:
Pew Pew is easy to pick up and fun to play, the game features:

  • Multiple enemy types that keep the game different
  • Fun and endless game-play
  • High scores and points
  • Able to run on most windows devices
  • Easy to play at work, school or home

Made by Hayden Blomfield on Godot Engine v3.0.0

You can check out our other games on our website (there might not be any more right now)
